import React from 'react' import useEmblaCarousel from 'embla-carousel-react' import './EmblaCarousel.css' import Autoplay from 'embla-carousel-autoplay' import img_1 from '../Assets/1.jpg' import img_2 from '../Assets/2.jpg' import img_3 from '../Assets/3.jpg' import img_4 from '../Assets/4.jpg' import img_5 from '../Assets/5.jpg' export const EmblaCarousel = () => { const [emblaRef] = useEmblaCarousel({ loop: false }, [Autoplay()]) return (
) }
